reviews.review_text:
While the view is nice, beach facing and pretty scenes, the rudeness of the service staff is applaudable. We were served extremely cold soup and when we pointed it out, he made a dirty face and said "it is so hot". Also after taking our order of breads after 30 minutes he returns saying we don't have that particular bread.

The food is also average at best. The xacuti didn't feel unique at all and lacked flavour overall.

Avoid.

Dis shack is located at candolim beach in goa its 45 mins drive from mapusa taxi stand one of the pleasant and less crowded beach of goa if u ask abt ambience than its really cool and beautiful not very noisy and staff is very friendly and co operative one more thing they dont serve pork or beef so we selected this place for dinner ..we ordered chicken white cheese pasta it was the best white sauce pasta i had in time full of chicken and cream with olives but little oily so i asled dem to prepare it in less oil and to the point it was yummiest if u r white pasta sauce lover than this place is for u i ordered chicken steak it was ok ok in taste not great was sweet in taste i asked them to prepare little spicy so on request they did but not great yes i requested to put more vegetables and they acknowledged that was really good gesture of staff i really loved the place u can try on ur trip to goa they wont disappoint u little expensive

We have been coming to Goa for 15 years and always used Bobby's shack.  The food is excellent the staff are ALL attentive and very friendly.   Definitely the best shack in Goa.  You must visit this shack. Well done Sanjay Kash and all the hard working staff that have continued to maintain an excellent reputation in memory of dear Bobby godbless
Jack and Bridgette
